name: Claudia
info: Dependable, tenacious, and overwhelmingly excited when it comes to battle. Comes across as aloof, but is kind and passionate once people get to know her. Claudia has a burning sense of justice, standing always ready to help others and fight injustice wherever she finds it.
description:
A tall Hykros Executor with a bit of a military demeanor.
Her mastery over one-handed swords and mobility saw her on the front lines of difficult operations, but Claudia was sent to a medical facility after being severely injured in Operation Dark Apocalypse.

skills.name: Quick Slash
skills.description: While on the ground, swing the blade to attack 5 times in a row. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 46.8% of ATK plus 2 and knock the target back a short distance. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 65.6% of ATK plus 3 and knock the target back a short distance. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 59.3% of ATK plus 3 and knock the target back a short distance. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 104.1% of ATK plus 5 and knock the target back a short distance. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 177.8% of ATK plus 9 and launch the target.

skills.name: Jumping Strike
skills.description: While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 27.9% of ATK plus 1. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 48.4% of ATK plus 3. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 114.6% of ATK plus 6. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 139% of ATK plus 7.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: Hold the normal attack button after normal attacks to trigger Cyclone. Upon hit, suspend the target and deal 47.8% of ATK plus 3 to a single target.

skills.name: Diving Edge
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Diving Edge. While falling, deal damage equal to 10% of ATK plus 1 each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to 76.4% of ATK plus 4 to surrounding targets and knock them back. The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to 600% damage.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to 570% of ATK plus 30.

skills.name: Leap Attack
skills.description: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Leap Attack. The Wanderer swings their blade forward and deals damage equal to 37.9% of ATK plus 2 to the target, strongly suspending them while going airborne. Then, deal additional damage equal to 56.8% of ATK plus 3 to the target.

skills.name: Roam
skills.description: Roam through targets while swinging the blade, dealing total damage equal to 418% of ATK plus 22 to up to 5 targets (damage dealt by each consecutive hit on the same target will be reduced by 20% from the previous hit). After Roam has concluded, slash the space in front, dealing area damage equal to 264% of ATK plus 14 to surrounding targets and suspending them. Become immune to control effects while skill is in use, and all damage taken is reduced by 50%. Cooldown: 15 seconds.

skills.name: Unbridled Flurry
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the Wanderer, then rush to the target and strongly suspend them, dealing 523.3% of ATK plus 28 damage, leaving behind a Bladestorm that deals 209.6% of ATK plus 11 damage, while gaining immunity to grievous/freeze/burn/electrify effects for 5 seconds.

weapon_type.name: Grievous
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will cause enemies to become grievous for 7 seconds, increasing their damage received by 20% and dealing damage equal to 137% of ATK. When in team play, grievous targets receive an additional 20% physical damage.

weapon_resonance.name: Physical Resonance
weapon_resonance.description: Physical Resonance: Increase physical ATK by 15% and physical resistance by 25%. Activate by equipping 2 or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

advancement: After hitting a target with a skill or discharge skill, grant 1 stack of the following buff: Increase damage dealt by 8% for 25 seconds, stacking up to 3 times for a maximum of 1 stack per skill use.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.

When hitting a target with a skill or discharge skill, apply 1 stack of War Wounds to the target: Increase incoming physical damage and shatter from physical weapons by 10% for 15 seconds. Stack up to 1 time.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 32%.
Hitting targets with skills or discharge skills grants damage boost, which increases all damage by 20% for 25 seconds. This effect does not stack.
Skills hitting the same target no longer have reduced damage. After using Guren Blade's skills or discharge skill, all targets with War Wounds within 8 meters gain another 1 stack of War Wounds.

traits.name: Blink
traits.description: Go invisible for 1 second upon dodging.

traits.name: Shadow
traits.description: Go invisible for 1.5 seconds upon dodging.
